Articles.Content:
could someone please make a mod so that all propellant tanks (or at least the ones that currently have LFO in them) can be right clicked and then they can be switched to LF only for nuclear rockets? I don't want any more parts to select from, my selection screen is cluttered enough as it is.

thanks guys

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121321-Stock-Fuel-Switch](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121321-Stock-Fuel-Switch)

This should do what you're looking for, and there were no opportunities for shady texture shenanigans. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
